meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Vichench Dan Sadoff Richard Neale Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1336.

td.p: Jim Vichench, a railroad clerk from Brooklyn, New York
Dan Sadoff, a veternarian from Saint Paul, Minnesota
Richard Neale, a taxpayer service representative from Concord, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $56,000)

tr.td: IN THE NEWS
DIRECTORS
HODGEPODGE
LITERARY TERMS
TEXAS
HATS
